name: admin.conversations.delete
desc: Delete a public or private channel.

errors.channel_not_found: The value passed for `channel_id` was invalid.
errors.channel_type_not_supported: The provided `channel_id` was a DM, MPDM, or the 'general' channel.
errors.could_not_delete_channel: The channel could not be deleted.
errors.default_org_wide_channel: The default org-wide channel cannot be deleted.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The token provided doesn't have access to this method.
errors.missing_scope: The provided token hasn't obtained the necessary scopes to use this method.
errors.not_an_admin: The token provided is not associated with an Org Owner or Admin.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from deleting this channel.
